metadata.title: CVE-2018-25017 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
RawSpeed (aka librawspeed) 3.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow inTableLookUp::setTable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-25017` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

darktable - 3.0.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-0ubuntu1').
